docs.snippet: Nassau County's emergency command center for dealing with disasters is hidden amid a maze of hallways and tunnels some 25 feet beneath Police Headquarters here. But these days it is the center itself that looks as if it had been hit by a disaster....
docs.abstract: Nassau County's emergency command center for dealing with disaster appears to have been poorly and haphazardly maintained; center is hidden amid maze of hallways and tunnels some 25 feet beneath Police Headquarters in Garden City; County Exec Thomas R Suozzi tours center, to dramatize his insistence that county had better prepare itself for terrorist attacks and other disasters; photos (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Nassau County's emergency command center for dealing with disasters is hidden amid a maze of hallways and tunnels some 25 feet beneath Police Headquarters here. But these days it is the center itself that looks as if it had been hit by a disaster. A dozen missing tiles give the ceiling a jumbled, checkerboard look. Tangles of wires and cables dangle randomly here and there. Hanging from one set of wires is a fire-alarm bell.

headline.main: Nassau's Disaster Command Post Looks a Lot Like a Disaster Site Itself

docs.snippet: HONGKONG, Sept. 29 -- According to a delayed dispatch from Peiping, China's worst floods of the past century inundated 41,665 square miles of land this year. The report was carried today by the Hsinhua (New China) news agency....
docs.abstract: Interior Min repts 41,665 sq mi flooded, 10 million evacuated

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: HONGKONG, Sept. 29 -- According to a delayed dispatch from Peiping, China's worst floods of the past century inundated 41,665 square miles of land this year. The report was carried today by the Hsinhua (New China) news agency.

headline.main: 41,665 SQUARE MILES HIT BY CHINESE FLOOD
